channel.title: Order Execution probably bugged
channel.description: KIng ordered execution n1 but failed to kill me, and I was a physician. Nobody healed me and I didnt get any message of being attacked or healed. I guess this ability has to be more straightforward? They thought I was MM and kept jailing me which later led to a lot of chaos. ![не умер|690x431](upload://zbnTK5aCVHoZAwY5IqWSIUUQcVg.jpg)

item.title: Order Execution probably bugged
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Why would they think you were mastermind! Order execution bypasses night immunity!!!

except when its bugged obviously

KIng ordered execution n1 but failed to kill me, and I was a physician. Nobody healed me and I didnt get any message of being attacked or healed. I guess this ability has to be more straightforward?
